corpses.name: A player corpse
corpses.description: The remains of a past adventurer.

corpses.name: Ant corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of an ant, a once industrious insect known for its strength and teamwork.

corpses.name: Bat corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a bat, a once nocturnal creature that used echolocation to navigate the darkness.

corpses.name: Cat corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a cat, a once stealthy and agile animal with sharp claws and keen senses.

corpses.name: Druid corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a druid, a once mystical being with the power to communicate with nature and transform into animals.

corpses.name: Ectoplasm corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of ectoplasm, a once ghostly substance often associated with spirits and the paranormal.

corpses.name: Frog corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a frog, a once small amphibian known for its jumping ability and croaking sound.

corpses.name: Gargoyle corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a gargoyle, a once stone creature that came to life, often serving as a guardian.

corpses.name: Harpy corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a harpy, a once mythical creature with the body of a bird and the face of a woman, known for its vicious nature.

corpses.name: Imp corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of an imp, a once small mischievous demon often causing trouble and playing tricks.

corpses.name: Jackal corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a jackal, a once cunning and opportunistic scavenger found in deserts and savannas.

corpses.name: Kappa corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a kappa, a once water spirit from Japanese folklore known for its trickery and love of cucumbers.

corpses.name: Lama corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a lama, a once peaceful and wise monk often found in remote mountain temples.

corpses.name: Mutant corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a mutant, a once creature altered by radiation or genetic experiments, possessing unusual powers.

corpses.name: Nook corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a nook, a once mysterious and elusive creature that dwelled in hidden corners of the world.

corpses.name: Ogre corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of an ogre, a once large and brutish monster known for its strength and appetite for destruction.

corpses.name: Pig corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a pig, a once domesticated animal known for its intelligence and fondness for mud.

corpses.name: Qilin corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a qilin, a once mythical creature from East Asian culture symbolizing prosperity and serenity.

corpses.name: Rat corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a rat, a once resourceful rodent often found in urban areas, known for its survival skills.

corpses.name: Succubus corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a succubus, a once demoness that seduced her victims, feeding off their life force.

corpses.name: Tengu corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a tengu, a once mythical bird-like creature from Japanese folklore, known for its martial prowess and trickery.

corpses.name: Unicorn corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a unicorn, a once majestic and magical horse with a single horn, symbolizing purity and grace.

corpses.name: Vampire corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a vampire, a once undead creature that fed on the blood of the living, often feared and hunted.

corpses.name: Wyrm corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a wyrm, a once serpentine dragon known for its cunning and hoarding of treasure.

corpses.name: Xelhua corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of Xelhua, a once giant from Aztec mythology, known for its immense strength and size.

corpses.name: Yeti corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a yeti, a once large and hairy creature said to inhabit the snowy mountains, often called the Abominable Snowman.

corpses.name: Zombie corpse
corpses.description: The lifeless remains of a zombie, a once undead being driven by an insatiable hunger for flesh, often found in hordes.
